author: Katelyn Polantz, Ali Zaslav and Donald Judd, CNN
title: Nursing homes still struggle to get protective gear and quick testing
description: Even inside nursing homes -- deemed a ground zero for the spread of coronavirus -- health care workers still don't have enough personal protective gear and the facilities can't get testing done quickly enough to effectively fight the virus.
content:
